name: riceCooker_start
description: This function is used to start the rice cooking process in a rice cooker with a specific mode.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to start cooking rice.

parameters.name: predefinedRiceCookerMode
parameters.description: The predefined mode to start cooking rice.
